english.segment1: (Chorus). Oh, happiness. There's grace enough for us. And the whole human race
english.segment2: (Verse 1). Friend or foe. Stranger or kin. All who come. Begin again
english.segment3: Hard or frail. Rich or poor. All in need. Need fear no more
english.segment4: Such a thing to give away
english.segment5: (Verse 2). All regrets. Let go, forget. There's something that. Mends all of it
english.segment6: Such a thing to give away
english.segment7: (Bridge). Sound the church bells. Let them ring. Let them ring. For everything can be redeemed. We can be redeemed. Oh,all of us
